title: Control Disclosure Packet
description: A schema for verifiable content disclosure.

content.description: Original content that is being signed and disclosed.

tagline.description: Additional identifier or attribution text associated with the content.

signature.description: Base64-encoded signature for the content and tagline.

publicKey.description: Base64-encoded public key used to verify the signature.

hashAlgorithm.description: Algorithm used for hashing the content.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 formatted timestamp of when the signature was created.

mediaType.description: Original media or content type (e.g., text/plain, image/jpeg).
